verbose_text: In skeletal muscle, AMPK indirectly activates SIRT1 by increasing NAD + through increased mitochondrial beta oxidation [XREF_BIBR] and increased expression of nicotinamide phosphoribosyltransferase (NAMPT) [XREF_BIBR], which is the rate limiting enzyme in NAD + synthesis [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: AMPK indirectly activates SIRT1 by increasing NAD
